title: Build professional developer portfolio website

requirements.text: Create a Hero section with name display 'Aspiring Software Developer | Computer Science Student', a short introduction paragraph focused on problem-solving and building real-world applications, and two call-to-action buttons labeled 'View Projects' and 'Download Resume'. Implement subtle entrance animations (fade-in + slide-up) for text and buttons on page load.

quotes: Name and title: "Aspiring Software Developer | Computer Science Student"
Short introduction focused on problem-solving and building real-world applications
Call-to-action buttons: View Projects and Download Resume
Subtle entrance animation for text and buttons

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the exact title 'Aspiring Software Developer | Computer Science Student'
Short introduction paragraph is present and focuses on problem-solving
Two distinct CTA buttons are visible: 'View Projects' and 'Download Resume'
Entrance animations trigger on page load with fade-in and slide-up effects

requirements.text: Create an About Me section with a concise, professional bio of 5-6 lines that focuses on technical curiosity, learning mindset, and career goals. Implement gentle fade-in animation that triggers when the section scrolls into view.

quotes: Concise, professional bio (5–6 lines)
Focus on technical curiosity, learning mindset, and career goals
Gentle fade-in animation on scroll

acceptanceCriteria: About Me section contains a bio text of 5-6 lines
Bio emphasizes technical curiosity, learning mindset, and career goals
Fade-in animation triggers when section enters viewport

requirements.text: Create a Skills section with categorized skill groups: Languages, Frontend, Backend, Databases, and Tools. Display skills in a clean grid layout with hover micro-interactions (subtle scale or color change on hover).

quotes: Categorized skill sections: Languages, Frontend, Backend, Databases, Tools
Clean grid layout with hover micro-interactions

acceptanceCriteria: Five distinct skill categories are displayed: Languages, Frontend, Backend, Databases, Tools
Skills are arranged in a grid layout
Hover effects are implemented on skill items with subtle visual feedback

requirements.text: Create a Projects section with professional project cards. Each card must display: project title, 1-2 line problem-focused description, tech stack used, GitHub link button, and Live Demo button. Implement hover animations on cards (slight scale up and shadow enhancement). Emphasize functionality and impact in descriptions.

quotes: Professional project cards with: Project title, 1–2 line problem-focused description, Tech stack used, GitHub link and Live Demo button
Hover animation on cards (slight scale / shadow)
Emphasis on functionality and impact

acceptanceCriteria: Project cards display all required fields: title, description, tech stack, GitHub and Live Demo buttons
Descriptions are 1-2 lines and problem-focused
Hover effect scales card slightly and enhances shadow
Multiple sample projects are displayed to demonstrate the layout

requirements.text: Create a Resume section with a clear button to download resume (PDF format). Implement professional styling with hover feedback (color change, scale, or shadow).

quotes: Clear button to download resume (PDF)
Professional styling with hover feedback

acceptanceCriteria: Resume download button is clearly visible and labeled
Button indicates PDF download functionality
Hover effect provides visual feedback

requirements.text: Create a Contact section displaying an email address, GitHub and LinkedIn icon links, and a simple contact form. Implement subtle animations on form interaction (focus states, input animations).

quotes: Email address, GitHub and LinkedIn icons
Simple contact form
Subtle animations on interaction

acceptanceCriteria: Email address is displayed clearly
GitHub and LinkedIn icons are present and linked
Contact form includes standard fields (name, email, message)
Form inputs show subtle animations on focus/interaction

requirements.text: Implement smooth fade-in and slide-up animations on scroll for all major sections (About Me, Skills, Projects, Contact). Ensure animations are triggered when sections enter the viewport and feel professional and fast.

quotes: Smooth fade-in + slide-up animations on scroll
Animations must feel professional, fast, and non-distracting

acceptanceCriteria: Sections animate into view when scrolled to
Animation combines fade-in and slide-up effects
Animations are smooth and complete within 0.3-0.6 seconds
No animation lag or jank

requirements.text: Implement subtle hover effects throughout the site: buttons should have scale or color transitions, cards should lift slightly or enhance shadows, and navigation items should display animated underline or highlight effects. Ensure smooth page scrolling behavior.

quotes: Subtle hover effects on buttons, cards, and links
Animated underline or highlight on navigation items
Smooth page scrolling and transitions

acceptanceCriteria: All buttons respond to hover with visual feedback
Cards have lift or shadow enhancement on hover
Navigation items show animated underline or highlight on hover
Page scrolling is smooth (no instant jumps)

requirements.text: Apply a modern, minimal design system with a neutral base color palette plus one accent color. Use high-quality typography (Inter or Poppings-style font), balanced whitespace, consistent spacing throughout, and excellent contrast for readability. Implement either a light or dark theme with professional polish.

quotes: Clean, modern UI inspired by top tech portfolios
Minimal color palette (neutral base + one accent color)
High-quality typography (Inter / Poppins style)
Balanced whitespace and consistent spacing
Light or dark theme with excellent contrast

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses neutral base colors with one distinct accent color (not blue and purple combination)
Typography resembles Inter or Poppins font families
Whitespace and spacing are consistent across all sections
Text has excellent contrast against backgrounds
Overall design feels modern and minimal

requirements.text: Establish a modern, sophisticated visual theme with a minimal aesthetic that conveys professionalism suitable for tech recruiters. The design should feel premium yet approachable, with a cohesive color scheme, typography hierarchy, and spacing system that creates visual harmony across all sections. Avoid blue and purple color schemes unless explicitly requested.

quotes: modern, minimal, and recruiter-friendly
Clean, modern UI inspired by top tech portfolios

acceptanceCriteria: Visual design feels cohesive and professional across all sections
Color scheme is sophisticated and suitable for a developer portfolio
Typography hierarchy is clear and readable
Overall aesthetic appeals to tech recruiters and hiring managers

constraints: Animations must be subtle, professional, and non-distracting
Design must be recruiter-friendly and suitable for college placement applications
Color palette must use neutral base with one accent color (avoid blue and purple unless requested)
All interactive elements must have appropriate hover states
Typography must be high-quality (Inter or Poppins style)
nonGoals: Multiple color themes or theme switcher
Admin dashboard or content management system
Backend data persistence for projects or skills
